title: Pemanfaatan pc 486 dx sebagai router guna pengaturan network load traffic balancing
abstract: The using of PC 486 DX for managing in network load traffic balancing as simple router that can be applicated in connecting from computer to computer or LAN to LAN. This router completed with the managing of load traffic balancing that can prevent and reduce the complexity of data transmision process in computer network. The main purpose of designing this router is to help PetraNet network restucturation that sometimes have load traffic in data transfer process from one host to other host. From the final result, it shown that PC 486 DX can be used as router as new gateway that can be applicated in PetraNet Network, dan support all internet aplication process at clients network.
